title._content: Kinderarbeid in de aardewerkindustrie / Children working in the pottery industry

description._content: 256-1591 Nationaal Archief Nederlands: Kinderarbeid in de aardewerkindustrie. Nederland, Gouda, omstreeks 1900. English: Children working in the pottery industry.
